results.name: Tom Clancy's Ghost ReconÂ® Breakpoint
results.description: Installs Ubisoft Connect to allow you to download Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Breakpoint and play.
results.content:
files:
- setup: https://ubistatic3-a.akamaihd.net/orbit/launcher_installer/UbisoftConnectInstaller.exe
game:
  arch: win64
  args: uplay://launch/1771/0
  exe: drive_c/Program Files (x86)/Ubisoft/Ubisoft Game Launcher/UbisoftConnect.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: corefonts
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2010 vcrun2012 vcrun2015 win10
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /S
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  disable_compositor: true
  env:
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE: 1
    __GL_SHADER_DISK_CACHE_PATH: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  dxvk: true
  esync: true
